occupation: Senior Partner Account Manager - US and Canada  at Drivewyze
headline: Senior Partnership Manager | Mobility | MDM | IoT | SaaS | ELD
summary:
A result-oriented channel sales and marketing practitioner having 10+ years of international sales and marketing experience. While working with global brands like Samsung Electronics, Nokia, Foxconn, and Electrolux; my major responsibilities include managing the brand & corporate marketing activities. I got the opportunity to deeply explore various marketing disciplines like brand management, advertising, media buying, digital media, retail sales management, event management, marketing research, loyalty marketing, and PR. I got a chance to travel to North American, Middle East, and South Asian countries for various partner campaigns, partner events, workshops, and conferences.

I am a seasoned channel sales leader and marketing manager with experience in building quality teams to achieve sales and marketing targets. A truly passionate and committed marketing manager with several years of experience in North American and international markets.

Product Marketing Management & Project Management professional with extensive Telecommunication Industry experience at the Distribution and Manufacturer levels. 


Specialties: Excellent communication and listening skills.
Optimistic with an ability to inspire and motivate team players.

Self-motivated and result oriented.

Strong Analytical skills.

Business & Market Planning

Marketing Management

Business development

10+ years of sales experience

5+ years of marketing experience

10+ years experience in Wireless Communications Industry

experiences.title: Territory Sales Representative - GTA
experiences.description:
muhammad.fashi@rci.rogers.com
647 740 6600
Rogers Communications is a diversified Canadian communications and media company engaged in three primary lines of business with 10,000+ employees. Rogers Wireless is Canada's largest wireless voice and data communications services provider and the country's only national carrier operating on both the world standard GSM and HSPA technology platforms. Rogers Cable is a leading Canadian cable services provider, offering cable television, high-speed Internet access, and telephony products for residential and business customers, and operating a retail distribution chain which offers Rogers branded wireless and home entertainment services. Rogers Media is Canada's premier group of category-leading broadcast, specialty, print and on-line media assets with businesses in radio and television broadcasting, televised shopping, magazine and trade journal publication, and sports entertainment. 

My role was generate new business in assigned territories through prospecting, cold calling networking and generating leads and referrals. Identify customer needs and utilize solution-based selling techniques to fully demonstrate the value of Rogers Digital cable, High speed internet, wire line and Wireless products and services.
 
 -I was responsible for sales of Digital cable, High speed internet, wire line phone and wireless devices and data plans.
